languages.text: Хормейстер заперся в капелле астропатического хора и никого не впускает. Нужно разобраться в ситуации и возобновить работу хора.

traits.locale_text: Хормейстер в одиночку заперся в астропатической капелле и никого не впускает. Нужно разобраться в ситуации и возобновить работу хора.

languages.text: The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.
languages.original_text: Хормейстер заперся в капелле астропатического хора и никого не впускает. Нужно разобраться в ситуации и возобновить работу хора.

traits.locale_text: The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic chapel and won't let anyone in."The situation must be addressed so that the choir can resume its work.
The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic chapel and won't let anyone in."The situation must be addressed so that the choir can resume its work.
The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic chapel and won't let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the choir can resume its work.

The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.
The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.

languages.text: El maestro del Coro se ha encerrado en la Capilla de Astrópatas y no deja pasar a nadie. Debes solucionar la situación para que el Coro pueda continuar con su trabajo.
languages.original_text: The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.

traits.locale_text: El maestro del Coro se ha encerrado en la Capilla de Astrópatas y no deja pasar a nadie. Debes solucionar la situación para que el Coro pueda continuar con su trabajo.

languages.text: クワイアーマスターが感応通信官の礼拝堂に閉じこもって、誰ひとりとして入れようとしない。この事態をなんとかして、聖歌隊の仕事を再開させなければ。
languages.original_text: The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.

traits.locale_text: クワイアーマスターが感応通信官の礼拝堂に閉じこもって、誰ひとりとして入れようとしない。この事態をなんとかして、聖歌隊の仕事を再開させなければ。

languages.text: 唱诗大师把自己锁在了星语者礼拜堂，不允许任何人进入。必须解决这个问题，这样星语唱诗班才能重新开始工作。
languages.original_text: The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.

traits.locale_text: 唱诗大师把自己锁在了星语者礼拜堂，不允许任何人进入。必须解决这个问题，这样星语唱诗班才能重新开始工作。

languages.text: Der Chormeister hat sich in der Astropathischen Kapelle eingeschlossen und lässt niemanden hinein. Die Situation muss behoben werden, damit der Chor seine Arbeit fortsetzen kann.
languages.original_text: The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.

traits.locale_text: Der Chormeister hat sich in der Astropathischen Kapelle eingeschlossen und lässt niemanden hinein. Die Situation muss behoben werden, damit der Chor seine Arbeit fortsetzen kann.

languages.text: Le maître de chœur s'est enfermé dans la chapelle astropathique et refuse de laisse qui que ce soit entrer. Il faut absolument remédier à cette situation pour que le chœur puisse reprendre son travail.
languages.original_text: The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.

traits.locale_text: Le maître de chœur s'est enfermé dans la chapelle astropathique et refuse de laisse qui que ce soit entrer. Il faut absolument remédier à cette situation pour que le chœur puisse reprendre son travail.

languages.text: Koro Şefi kendisini Astropatik Şapel'e kilitledi ve içeri kimseyi almıyor. Koro'nun çalışmalarına devam edebilmesi için bu durumla ilgilenilmeli.
languages.original_text: The Choirmaster has locked himself inside the Astropathic Chapel and will not let anyone in. The situation must be addressed so that the Choir can resume its work.
